abstract: PepsiCo, the maker of Gatorade, said it would introduce a lower-calorie version later in the year for athletes when they are not breaking a sweat.
snippet: PepsiCo, the maker of Gatorade, said it would introduce a lower-calorie version later in the year for athletes when they are not breaking a sweat.
lead_paragraph: At a time of relatively sluggish sales and a profusion of new competitors, PepsiCo, the maker of Gatorade, said yesterday that it would introduce a lower-calorie version later in the year for athletes when they are not breaking a sweat.

headline.main: For Less-Active Athletes, a Low-Calorie Gatorade
headline.print_headline: For Less-Active Athletes, a Low-Calorie Gatorade
